description:
* Based on the role-playing video game Blue Reflection from http://anidb.net/cr40184 [Gust] and http://anidb.net/cr42315 [Koei Tecmo].
Optimistic http://anidb.net/ch115508 [Hiori] can`t turn away anyone in need. Clumsy http://anidb.net/ch115509 [Ruka] can`t seem to make friends, even when she tries. Together, this unlikely pair will use the power as Reflectors to help those in need with their emotional struggles and change the world.
Source: funimation

REGULAR.description:
Ruka transfers to Tsukinomiya Girls` High School, but has a hard time fitting in with her classmates. She then has an unexpected encounter with her new roommate Hiori, when she climbs through their dorm window.
Source: Funimation

http://anidb.net/ch116179 [Momo] tells http://anidb.net/ch115508 [Hiori] and http://anidb.net/ch115509 [Ruka] more about Reflectors and Fragments. Hiori is instantly interested in learning more while Ruka is very hesitant. Meanwhile, even though they were able to save http://anidb.net/ch116180 [Miyako] the day before, trouble befalls her again.
Source: Funimation

http://anidb.net/ch115508 [Hiori] and http://anidb.net/ch115509 [Ruka] fight the two Reflectors that are trying to steal http://anidb.net/ch116180 [Miyako]`s Fragment.
Source: Funimation

http://anidb.net/ch116180 [Miyako] tries to get http://anidb.net/ch115508 [Hiori] and http://anidb.net/ch115509 [Ruka] to cooperate better with each other. http://anidb.net/ch116179 [Momo] tries to face her past.
Source: Funimation

The girls try to track down someone named Princess Yuki who runs a chat room claiming she can make someone`s pain and suffering go away.
Source: Funimation

http://anidb.net/ch116176 [Niina] decides to give her all to http://anidb.net/ch116177 [Mio]. Meanwhile, http://anidb.net/ch116179 [Momo] and the other girls get more clues concerning a girl named Kana.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Kokoro ni Ibara o Motsu Shoujo
The Girl with Briars Surrounding Her Heart

REGULAR.description:
The girls continue to try to track down Kana. Meanwhile, Ruka asks Momo about her connection with Mio.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Onegai Dakara Hoshii Mono o Te ni Iresasete
Please, Just Let Me Have What I Want
お願いだから欲しいものを手に入れさせて

REGULAR.description:
Hiori tries to stay strong despite finding out the truth about her sister, but Ruka tries to get Hiori to be honest for everyone`s sake.
Source: Funimation

Momo tracks down Mio to ask her about their past and find out why they`re enemies now.
Source: Funimation

Momo tells Hiori, Ruka, and Miyako what happened with Mio and tells them what`s supposed to happen in three days. Miyako feels differently about what they should do next, causing a rift between all of them.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: The Beautiful Girls Digging a Grave
墓を掘る美しい娘たち

REGULAR.description:
Momo and Hiori go to save Ruka and have their final showdown with Mio and the others.
Source: Funimation

Hiori and Ruka fight Shion, Niina, and Uta to try to get Mio and Momo back.
Source: Funimation

Hiori, Ruka, and Miyako try to figure out what their next step is after what happened with Mio and Momo.
Source: Funimation

Hiori wants to team up with Niina to get everyone`s feelings back. Meanwhile, Ryoka tells Ruka about her and Amiru`s past.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: The Witness Who Lost Her Words
言葉をなくした目撃者

REGULAR.description:
Hiori brings Niina to the dorms. Ryoka and Amiru come over to help the girls clean the dorms and Amiru asks to talk to Ruka.
Source: Funimation

Hiori and Ruka try to talk to Lime and Yuzu to see if they can return feelings that have been stolen. Meanwhile, Ryoka and Amiru make a decision.
Source: Funimation

Niina shows Hiori the event that changed Mio forever.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: エンジェル・エンジェル

REGULAR.description:
Ruka goes to look for Hiori since she ran off after finding out what happened in the past with her sister. Hiori finds herself not knowing what to do anymore.
Source: Funimation

The doors to the Common open and Hiori and Ruka must figure out how to close them once more.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Found You, Found You, I Found You
見つけた, 見つけた, 見つけたよ

REGULAR.description:
The girls face off with Shino and their own pasts. Will they be able to change Shino`s mind about feelings?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: ギロチンのマーガレット

REGULAR.description:
With a renewed sense of determination and confidence, the girls get ready to go to the Common to face off with Shino.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Mada Nanimo Mono ni Shite Inai yo
まだ何もものに していないよ

REGULAR.description:
Hiori finds a little girl wandering around Saint Inés Academy that resembles Shino and the girls find out the horrible truth about Shino`s past.
Source: Funimation

Hiori and the others head into the Common to find Shino to stop her once and for all.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Subete o Te ni Shita Kimi
すべてを手にしたきみ

REGULAR.description:
Hiori and the others try to save Shino and the world once and for all.
Source: Funimation
